sections.heading: Act, how cited; declaration of policy
sections.text: Sections 37-1201 to 37-12,110 shall be known and may be cited as the State Boat Act. It is the policy of this state to promote safety for persons and property in and connected with the use, operation, and equipment of vessels and to promote uniformity of laws re

sections.heading: 37-1201 to 37-12,110 shall be known and may be cited as the State Boat Act
sections.text: It is the policy of this state to promote safety for persons and property in and connected with the use, operation, and equipment of vessels and to promote uniformity of laws relating thereto.
